snippet: Wal-Mart Stores Inc's top retailing expert Andy Murray has been sent over to its British supermarkets operator Asda to try to reverse a decline in sales and loss of market share to fast-growing discount rivals....
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores Inc's top retailing expert Andy Murray has been sent over to its British supermarkets operator Asda to try to reverse a decline in sales and loss of market share to fast-growing discount rivals.

headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Retailing Expert Andy Murray Moves to UK Arm Asda
headline.main: Wal-Mart Retailing Expert Andy Murray Moves to UK Arm Asda
